title: Game crash
body:
Hi,,

after my windows 10 update my league doesnt work anymore. I can login... I can go to championselect and I can load the game.. but the second I spawn in the world the game just freezes and crashes... I dont get any bugsplat popup or something. Just freeze and crash and I need to switch my on off button of the laptop... because my laptop doesnt respond to any other key I press.... I looked at the files... and I saw these sentences : 

000125.340|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "DATA/Characters/LevelProp_sru_snail3/LevelProp_sru_snail3.bin" because it's not in the manifest.
000125.343|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "DATA/Characters/LevelProp_sru_lizard11/LevelProp_sru_lizard11.bin" because it's not in the manifest.
000125.346|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "DATA/Characters/LevelProp_SRU_AntlerMouse11/LevelProp_SRU_AntlerMouse11.bin" because it's not in the manifest.
000125.348|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "DATA/Characters/LevelProp_sru_snail14/LevelProp_sru_snail14.bin" because it's not in the manifest.
000125.351|  ERROR| Riot::RADS::IO::OpenFile: RADS cannot open file "DATA/Characters/L

**Can anyone help me please?**

replies.body:
*Raises hand* **I can help!**

I've been seeing this quite a bit, as the Windows 10 Anniversary updates have been rolling out. Inside this update, the Xbox Game DVR feature was enabled by default and has been causing full system freezes and game crashes. I recommend temporarily disabling the feature entirely to see if it fixes this problem. [Here's ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html)a guide on how to do this.

Let me know if this resolved it for you.
Nice! Thx man! That fixed my problem

today 5 games went fine. now i get ghost screen and unknown error reports over and over. i can get into champ select nemesis draft, but then i get pop up error unknown over and over.  i dont get these.  very rare. usually an easy fix with provider updating and having connect issues stable. but today i can do everything else on the web and play other mmo games, but cant pass champ select last hour and i have caught a 2 hour ban! 2 hour. never saw that coming or knew u had implemented it.
I have the same problem... I hope riot takes notice of this
